response.overview: Filmed at Saint Luke's in Chicago with it's congregation that is ethnically, economically and vocationally diverse encompassing variety in both age & gender, This Holy Night is a classic Christmas Eve service for all the family to enjoy, emphasizing music performed by a 35-voice broadcast choir, a 20-voice children's choir, a 20-piece orchestra featuring brass and strings, six-piece jazz ensemble and an organist! Celebrate This Holy Night together with your family and friends as a time to remember the true meaning of Christmas and the birth of Jesus Christ, a time to reflect on the contribution we can make to uniting a world of diverse cultures in lasting peace.
response.title: This Holy Night
